mosinstall.name: default
mosinstall.author: soeren
mosinstall.description: The default theme is a clean and basic layout for VirtueMart.

param.name: productListStyle
param.label: Product List Style
param.description: Select the style of the product listings (=browse page)
param.option: Flat Product List (fixed to 1 product per row, using a table)

param.name: showAddtocartButtonOnProductList
param.label: Show the Add-to-cart Button on the product list?
param.description: Show/Hide the add-to-cart button on the main product listings. Customers will then be able to purchase the product from the details page only.

param.name: showVendorLink
param.label: Show Vendor Link?
param.description: Show/Hide the link to the vendor of a product

param.name: showManufacturerLink
param.label: Show Manufacturer Link?
param.description: Show/Hide the link to the manufacturer of a product

param.name: showAvailability
param.label: Show Availability Information?
param.description: Show/Hide the availability information of a product

param.name: showPathway
param.label: Show additional Pathway on the Product Page?
param.description: Show/Hide the pathway on the product details page (The global pathway is updated anyway)
